channel.title: Agimus Winter School Materials
channel.description: Recent content on Agimus Winter School Materials

item.title: Program
item.description: Welcome to Agimus Winter School ! # Agimus is a European research program founded by Horizon Europe, coordinated by LAAS-CNRS (FR) and gathering Inria (FR), CTU (CZ), PAL-Robotics (SP) and other industrial partners, studying the next generation of AI-powered robots for agile production. The consortium developed an internationally recognized expertise in motion planning, optimal control, computer vision, reinforcement learning, force control and robot design, along with mature software to implement them.
